description: Single story step can map to multiple responsibilities when it involves multiple concepts

examples.description: Allow story step to map to multiple responsibilities from different concepts
examples.content: Story step 'AI Chat detects trigger words and routes to Behavior Action Tool via Bot MCP Server' maps to both 'AI Chat: Detects Trigger Words And Routes To Tools' AND 'MCP Bot Server: Routes Tool Calls'

examples.description: Don't force single mapping when step involves multiple concepts
examples.content: Story step involving both AI Chat and MCP Bot Server should map to both concepts' responsibilities
